CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT , CHI and INV enter room . MOT is holding CHI's hand . CHI lets go of MOT's hand and reaches for jack+in+the+box . INV explains warm-up to MOT
CHI is sitting and playing with jack+in+the+box
<aft> MOT kneels down next to CHI
MOT pretends to turn crank in air
MOT moves toy car out of the way

MOT looks at CHI then at the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns away from jack+in+the+box and looks at the book on the floor

INV enters room greeting MOT and CHI . INV asks CHI to sit at table and explains Small Scale Activity . INV leaves room at 09:44:10 while small scale activity takes place until INV reenters the room at 09:48:45
INV explains the Forbidden Object activity to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table
INV puts Forbidden object on table
CHI watches INV and then looks down at the base of the object
INV is out of view of the camera
CHI stares wide eyed at object . CHI begins to follow the motion of the balls with her eyes
<aft> MOT leans closer to CHI and table
CHI points to the object then reaches out to touch ball trying to catch it while it moves . CHI smiles

CHI looks back at forbidden object
CHI again reaches for the forbidden objects suspended balls
a îa î a îa î

MOT rubs her hand on the back of CHI
MOT touches hair of CHI in back and front
